languages.text: "Я люблю вас слишком сильно, чтобы шутить о подобном".

traits.locale_text: "Я люблю вас слишком сильно, чтобы шутить о подобном".

languages.text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
languages.original_text: "Я люблю вас слишком сильно, чтобы шутить о подобном".

traits.locale_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
"I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
"I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
"I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
"I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

languages.text: “我如此爱你，绝不可能将这一切看作玩笑。”
languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

traits.locale_text: “我如此爱你，绝不可能将这一切看作玩笑。”

languages.text: "Ich bin zu sehr in Euch verliebt, um über solche Dinge zu scherzen."
languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin zu sehr in Euch verliebt, um über solche Dinge zu scherzen."

languages.text: « Je suis trop {mf|épris|éprise} de vous pour prendre ces choses à la légère. »
languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis trop {mf|épris|éprise} de vous pour prendre ces choses à la légère. »

languages.text: «Estoy demasiado enamorado de usted como para darle importancia a esas cosas».
languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy demasiado enamorado de usted como para darle importancia a esas cosas».

languages.text: 「こういうことを軽んじるくらい、あなたへの想いは浅くない」
languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."

traits.locale_text: 「こういうことを軽んじるくらい、あなたへの想いは浅くない」

languages.original_text: "I am too deeply in love with you to make light of such things."
